This dress is beautiful and quality made. The piping is perfectly placed to accentuate curves while giving a slimming effect. For reference, I am 5’9”, 140 lbs and ordered a size medium in white. It hits me a few inches above my ankle with a generous slit in the back for ease of movement. The material is thicker, so it lays nicely and is not see through. I highly recommend this dress.

This dress is beautiful! The contrast piping makes a statement and I’m here for it! Thick fabric! Very well made! It hugs in all the right places, but not too much!  It zips up the back. True to size!

Okay, I’ll admit it—I bought this dress with serious skepticism. Influencer links don’t always deliver, and I was ready to end up with a regretful impulse buy. But surprise! This black dress with white piping exceeded my low expectations. The fit is great (I’m 5’4", 158 lbs, and the medium worked perfectly—maybe a touch roomy, which never happens). The length hit just right, so no awkward hemline drama here.  The fabric is thick enough to feel substantial but not quite thick enough to let you skip shapewear (sorry, gravity’s rules still apply). It doesn’t need a slip, though, which is a win! And I have to say, as a 45-year-old mom of five, I was nervous about how flattering it would be—but this dress totally delivered! It’s stylish, forgiving, and gave me a confidence boost I didn’t expect. If you’re on the fence like I was, this might just be the rare influencer win!

The dress fit well. It was snug in the right places and the fabric is a nice quality. However the white piping doesn't stay put. It would've been a 5 star dress if the white piping didn't move around. It is noticeable in photos.

This dress can be dressed up with a pair of heels but it also looks cute with my Adidas sneakers and a jean jacket. Perfect for travel because it doesn't wrinkle. I originally bought a M but decided to exchange it for the L just for added hip room.

Sizing info first: I am 5'1" and 120lb. I usually wear a size 2-4 or XS-S, depending on how forgiving the cut of the clothing is. Through a comedy of errors, I ended up ordering this in an XS instead of my intended S. The XS is wearable, but I think I might have been slightly more comfortable in the S. I'm too lazy to go through the return process, though, so I'm sticking with the XS.  Things I like about this dress: it's not too long on my short body. Bodice comes up high enough that I don't need a plunge-front bra (ignore the bit of my bra you can see in the pic, that was a particularly high-cut bra I just tried it on with). Similarly, the straps are thick enough to cover my bra straps. Fabric is thick and feels high-quality. The overall appearance is very flattering. I look..sexy?!  Things I don't like about the dress: the piping is attached weirdly, like on only one side of it or something. As a result, it sticks out in spots and looks uneven. The bodice is a bit too long for my short body, which means the waist doesn't sit quite right on my (but ymmv a lot). As I said in the "likes" section, the fabric is heavy, which is a double-edged sword. On the one hand, it feels substantial. On the other hand, despite this dress being sleeveless, I wouldn't want to wear it, say, outdoors during the summer. The fabric pulls a little across my hips, but that could very well be an artifact of the fact that I bought a slightly-too-small size rather than any fault of the dress's. It's also just the slightest bit sheer at the parts where it stretches the most. Not enough to really be a problem, but just something I noticed. Finally, the zipper is...recalcitrant. I couldn't get it all the way up myself, even though there was plenty of room in the back of the bodice.  Overall, I'd give this 4.5 stars out of 5, but I'm rounding it up to 5 since Amazon doesn't allow half-stars. I'd probably buy this again, but I'd go a size up next time.

评论详情: I was slightly hesitant ordering this dress because the price is quite significantly higher in Canadian Dollars, however, it does NOT disappoint.
